attributes.action: make national service compulsory for all school leavers not going on to further education or appretiships
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many children are leaving school unqualified and undisciplined. If a 16 year old leaves school and is not willing to go onto further education or enter an apprentiship in a trade then they should give 2 years national service to this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
